instructions: In a large skillet or wok, heat a small amount of oil (not listed as an ingredient, but necessary for cooking) over medium-high heat.
Add the sliced onions and cook until softened, about 3-5 minutes. Stir frequently.
Add the ground cinnamon, white sugar, cider vinegar, Chinese five-spice powder, and black pepper to the skillet. Stir to combine and cook for 1 minute, allowing the spices to bloom.
Add the green beans and Cajun seasoning to the skillet. Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, or until the green beans are tender-crisp, stirring frequently.
Stir in the chopped green onions and fresh rosemary during the last minute of cooking. Cook until the green onions have slightly wilted.
Taste and adjust seasonings as needed. Serve immediately.
response.name: Spicy Green Bean Stir-Fry with Savory Herbs
